com.ibm.team.process.common.advice.runtime
Interface IOperationAdviceManager

public interface IOperationAdviceManager

The operation advice manager provides access to currently held operation reports and allows clients to register listeners which will be notified of events related to the advising and executing of advisable operations.

Since:
0.5

Field Summary
static int MODE_ADVISE
          Mode constant which indicates that advice should be computed for an operation.
static int MODE_ADVISE_AND_EXECUTE
          Mode constant which indicates that advice should be computed for an operation.
static int MODE_ADVISE_AND_EXECUTE_AGAIN
          Mode constant which indicates that advice should be computed for an operation.
static int MODE_EXECUTE
          Mode constant which indicates that an operation will be executed.
 
Method Summary

Field Detail

MODE_ADVISE

static final int MODE_ADVISE
Mode constant which indicates that advice should be computed for an operation. The operation will not be executed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MODE_ADVISE_AND_EXECUTE

static final int MODE_ADVISE_AND_EXECUTE
Mode constant which indicates that advice should be computed for an operation. Based on the advice, the operation may then be executed.

A given operation should not be advised in this mode more than once.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MODE_ADVISE_AND_EXECUTE_AGAIN

static final int MODE_ADVISE_AND_EXECUTE_AGAIN
Mode constant which indicates that advice should be computed for an operation. Based on the advice, the operation may then be executed.

A given operation should only be advised in this mode after it has been advised in mode IOperationAdviceManager.MODE_ADVISE_AND_EXECUTE.

A given operation may be advised in this mode multiple times.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MODE_EXECUTE

static final int MODE_EXECUTE
Mode constant which indicates that an operation will be executed.

A given operation should not be executed in this mode more than once.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getReports

IOperationReport[] getReports()
Returns the collection of operation reports contained in this manager. These reports may correspond to operations in any state: running, finished, or not yet started.

Returns:
the collection of operation reports contained in this manager

addAdviceListener

void addAdviceListener(IOperationAdviceListener listener)
Adds the given listener to the list of advice listeners which will be notified of events by this manager. Has no effect if the given listener has already been added.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to add

removeAdviceListener

void removeAdviceListener(IOperationAdviceListener listener)
Removes the given listener from the list of advice listeners which will be notified of events by this manager. Has no effect if the given listener has already been removed.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to remove
